title: What are some "hacks" you use in Pesu to make your life easier?

comments.body:
Destroy the servers for a free 20 in ISA
10/10 would recommend
Send tutorial for this(AV Summary preferred)
If u have block classes in the first 2 periods, going directly to the second class can get u attendance for both, although it depends on the teacher and their mood.

You can download textbooks online.
Also chances are somebody has a Google Drive with all the study material you need, you just have to find that someone.

I'll drop in one of my own. I am very respectful towards the non-teaching staff and many times I have got help from them.

Like during the recent AT, the parking uncle saw me and gave me a water bottle lol (if you were in the queue, you would know how tiring it was). He has also let me go many times without paying when it was late. So yeah, be friendly and respectful.
